column4: any of you using breezy with an IBM thinkpad? I just scored a new x40 from work yesterday and need to get the wireless and the sleep/suspend to work
everything else has been awesome so far
I'm using an X40-2527 just fine.
did you have to do anything special to get those 2 things to work?

why is that?
because I've been testing Breezy on this for a long time.
since you will dist-upgrade to Breezy (or install it fresh, then update) today, you won't have the issues I had
i did a dist-upgrade yesterday after installing and enabling the universe repos
you really need to be updating every hour or so
and just waiting for it to work?
it works as of right now.
again, you'll have missed all the bloody hacking to get it working :)
